snippet.title: Hiiro no Kakera Portable　（緋色の欠片） PSP
snippet.description:
A PSP version with some additions. The game originally came out for the PS2. The game series currently has 3 games, a sort of companion and a remake for the NDS.
Art by Kazuki Yone (カズキヨネ)
The song is Kimi ga Te o Nobasu Saki ni　by Fujita Maiko 
王題歌：君が手を伸ばす先に　（藤田麻衣子）

Walkthrough (攻略):
http://otome.girly.jp/hiiro/menu.html  (character names on the left side)
http://half-a.net/games1/hiiro.html  (character names on the top colored red)
